original_title: Gloria Trevi: Más allá de la trayectoria
overview: Gloria Trevi, the iconic Latin pop star often called "the Mexican Madonna," follows up a stormy, headline-making chapter of her life with this album, her first with record label Univision. Features include live performances of Trevi thrilling live audiences in Mexico City and Monterrey with hits old and new. The playlist includes "La Pasabas Bien Conmigo," "Zapatos Viejos," "Que Voy a Hacer Sin El?" "Si Me Llevas Contigo" and others.
title: Gloria Trevi: Más allá de la trayectoria
